alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 10:33PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Portage and Waushara Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1032 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plainfield, or 14 miles southeast of Wisconsin Rapids, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plainfield around 1040 PM CDT. Wautoma around 1100 PM CDT. Redgranite around 1110 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Silver Lake, Spring Lake, Lohrville, Almond, Mount Morris, Auroraville, Bancroft, Wild Rose, Hancock and Dakota. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
